根据您的要求，我们需要提取代码中所有显示给用户的自然文本，并将这些文本放入一个名为 `i18n` 的对象中，其键是文本内容，值设置为1。下面是根据您提供的代码提取的 JSON 格式的 `i18n` 对象：

```json
{
  "i18n": {
    "Analyse hash": 1,
    "Tries to determine information about a given hash and suggests which algorithm may have been used to generate it based on its length.": 1,
    "Hash length: ": 1,
    "Byte length: ": 1,
    "Bit length:  ": 1,
    "Based on the length, this hash could have been generated by one of the following hashing functions:": 1,
    "Invalid hash": 1
  }
}
```

以下是每个键对应的文本在代码中的位置：

- "Analyse hash"：类名和构造函数中的 `this.name`。
- "Tries to determine information about a given hash and suggests which algorithm may have been used to generate it based on its length."：构造函数中的 `this.description`。
- "Hash length: "、"Byte length: "、"Bit length:  "：`run` 方法中生成的输出文本。
- "Based on the length, this hash could have been generated by one of the following hashing functions:"：同样是 `run` 方法中生成的输出文本。
- "Invalid hash"：抛出 `OperationError` 时使用的文本。

请注意，我已经去除了代码中的URL、示例文本、输入/输出类型和其他非自然文本。每个键值对的值设置为1，按照您的要求进行了配置。
